EmailTemplate.name: ASI CRM VN Outlet Rejected Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Outlet {!ASI_CRM_AccountsAdditionalField__c.Name} has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_CRM_AccountsAdditionalField__c.OwnerFullName},
Your outlet {!ASI_CRM_AccountsAdditionalField__c.Name} has been rejected.
Please click this link {!ASI_CRM_AccountsAdditionalField__c.Link} to view the Outlet details.
